name: DPRi
tag_list: digital-pr, seo, content-marketing, public-relations, online-pr, content-production, media-relations, pr, press-relations, content-curation
overview:
DPRi blends public relations, SEO, social media management and content marketing to create global communications strategies that are faster, better and more cost-effective.

What it does is PR: evolved.

Run by digital natives using the latest collaboration and enabling technologies, the agency’s unique operational model enables the team to construct tailored local, national and international press teams rapidly, creating truly bespoke communications networks while drastically reducing campaign overheads at a stroke.

Put simply, DPRi’s teams apply an updated PR methodology that is swifter, safer and more cost-effective.

The agency provides a range of clients including NN4M, CereProc, SCC, Coventry Airport, ACS and MyCube with a transparent blend of corporate communications, content marketing, online reputation management, advanced digital asset curation and global news distribution, strategically applied to help deliver their business goals.
